text: There’s risperdol, haldol, seroquel... and numerous other antipsychotic meds that can help you. They will stop these delusional beliefs you have, Donnie.

text: No he needs a straight jacket and some Risperdol

text: Risperdol might help you. When you are admitted to St. Elizabeth’s ask your attending psychiatrist about it.

text: My Sebastian also has A.D.H.D., plus some sensory issues. My son can also have tantrums that can get violent. We have him on Adderol, Risperdol (antiphyschotic) during the day and clonidine (med for sleep and Seroquel- sedative)not every kid takes that much.

text: I was put on Vistaril for the anxiety, risperdol for mood swings, and we've tried multiple antidepressants with zero success.
